Dear mentor

This form helps you to check and evaluate Task6 Music App üéµ https://github.com/rolling-scopes-school/RSShool2021-Android-task6-Music-App

You have to
1. check the projects of your students according to task6 conditions
2. provide code review to your students and share the best practices to solve these kinds of challenges
3. rate the student's work from 0 (nothing done) to *130* (perfect work + additonal requirements) and submit the score on https://app.rs.school/course/mentor/submit-review?course=android-2021

If there are nuances that are not described in this form, interpret them by yourself (decreasing or increasing the score) at your discretion. Guide by common sense in this case üôâ

criteria.text: Tracks' data are read from JSON file. Parsing data from JSON is implemented.
Music is playing using URL from the parced data. At least "Play", "Pause", "Play Previous", "Play Next" controls are supported. Info about current track (title, author, album picture) are shown.
Rotation is supported. There are different layouts for portrait and landscape screen modes.
MVP or MVVM architecture is implemented.
ADDITIONAL: Dagger 2 or another DI is implemented.
Error-prone code (memory leaks, poor architecture style which leads to errors, etc.)

Messy and poor style of code:

abuse of !!, lateinit, etc.
poor variable naming
non-functional extra code
etc.
Some non-critical crashes during the work (during rotates, moves between screens, etc.)
